data.title: Lee Brice, Justin Moore Plot Co-Headlining American Made Tour
data.meta_description: Lee Brice and Justin Moore will launch the co-headlining American Made Tour in January.
data.text:
Two of country music’s heavy hitters will usher in 2017 with a co-headlining tour: Lee Brice and Justin Moore kick off their American Made trek on January 12th in Indianapolis. The tour will hit nearly two dozen cities.

Brice, who was the only country artist to perform in all 50 states during 2015, spent the early part of this year on the headlining Life Off My Years Tour with Tyler Farr, while Moore is currently wrapping up dates on Brantley Gilbert’s Take It Outside run. This will mark his third tour as a headliner.

Newcomer William Michael Morgan, who has a Top Five hit with “I Met a Girl,” will join Brice and Moore on the majority of dates, while Brett Young, whose debut single “Sleep Without You” is nearing the Top Ten, will open the last two dates on the current itinerary. Both acts released their debut EPs this year, with Morgan’s LP, Vinyl, due September 30th.

“It’s very exciting to get back out there as a headliner,” says Moore, whose fourth LP, Kinda Don’t Care, released in August, was the singer’s third to bow at Number One. “To be able to do it with my buddy Lee is even more exciting. I’ve been a fan of his for a long time. It’s gonna definitely be a party every night.”

“When we put this tour together we thought about the fans first,” adds the Grammy-nominated Brice. “I love playing live but what’s even more fun is interacting with the amazing people in the audience. That’s what it’s all about.”

Brice says his fans can expect to hear the hits, including “I Drive Your Truck” and “I Don’t Dance,” as well as some of the material he’s currently working on for his next album.

Here are the dates of Brice and Moore’s American Made Tour:

January 12 – Indianapolis, IN @ Bankers Life Fieldhouse

January 13 – La Crosse, WI @ La Crosse Center

January 14 – Rosemont, IL @ Rosemont Theatre

January 19 – Corbin, KY @ The Arena

Editor’s picks

Trending

All dates featuring William Michael Morgan, except as noted*
